Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor and other analytics tools to continuously track the performance of the CDN endpoints, including latency, throughput, and error rates.
Ensure that SSL/TLS certificates for CDN endpoints are valid and not nearing expiration. Renew certificates as needed to maintain secure connections.
Audit and optimize cache settings to ensure efficient content delivery and minimize latency. Adjust cache expiration policies based on content type and usage patterns.
Perform failover tests to verify that backup CDN endpoints or regions can take over in case of primary endpoint failures.
Review and update security policies, including firewall rules and access controls, to protect CDN endpoints from unauthorized access and attacks.
Conduct regular audits of CDN configurations to ensure alignment with documented architecture and best practices for the service.
Keep CDN service documentation up-to-date, including operational procedures, configuration details, and troubleshooting guides.
Run regular security scans on CDN endpoints to identify vulnerabilities and ensure compliance with security standards.
Analyze traffic patterns and optimize content delivery strategies, such as enabling compression or adjusting routing rules, to improve performance.
Conduct incident response drills to prepare the team for potential CDN outages or security incidents. Ensure familiarity with procedures and protocols.
Evaluate the SLA performance of the CDN provider. Address any issues or deviations from the agreed SLA metrics.
Develop and execute plans for CDN endpoint upgrades or expansions as needed. Ensure minimal disruption during these activities.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new CDN features, best practices, and security measures.
Regularly back up configurations of CDN endpoints and related settings. Ensure secure and accessible storage of backups for potential restoration.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding CDN performance and reliability. Implement continuous improvements based on this feedback.
